summary: Miss Universe is a big, yearly beauty contest for women from around the world. It's one of the most famous pageants, along with Miss World, Miss International, and Miss Earth. The Miss Universe Organization, owned by JKN Global Group and Legacy Holding Group USA Inc., runs the event. Telemundo will show it on TV until 2023. The current Miss Universe is Sheynnis Palacios from Nicaragua, who won in November 2023 in El Salvador. The pageant aims to highlight humanitarian issues and make a positive impact globally.
title: Miss Universe
